snippet: U.S. speedskating coach Jae Su Chun was placed on administrative leave Sunday, hours after his spokesman released a statement denying claims of verbal, physical and psychological abuse.
abstract: United States speedskating coach Jae Su Chun, who is accused of verbally, physically and psychologically abusing athletes, is placed on administrative leave.
lead_paragraph: U.S. speedskating coach Jae Su Chun was placed on administrative leave Sunday, hours after his spokesman released a statement denying claims of verbal, physical and psychological abuse.

headline.main: Accused of Abuse, Coach Proclaims Innocence
headline.print_headline: Accused of Abuse, Coach Proclaims Innocence
